mapper.select: SELECT course_id, course_name, course_begin, course_time, coach_account, employee_name, price, course_type FROM course INNER JOIN employee ON course.coach_account = employee.employee_account
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course (course_name, course_begin, course_time, coach_account, price, course_type) VALUES (#{courseName}, #{courseBegin}, #{courseTime}, #{coachAccount}, #{price}, #{courseType})
mapper.update: UPDATE course SET course_name = #{courseName}, course_begin = #{courseBegin}, course_time = #{courseTime}, coach_account = #{coachAccount}, price = #{price}, course_type =#{courseType} WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
